content: {A想象}I wonder... are there any <style=Highlight>Loomi Co.</style> staff on your planet? Once I have a place to stay, I'll head over right away.
Sounds good to me! I really want to smell the nice grassy scent on you in person... Unless, it's not grass... meh?
{A梳头}Baa-eh? If I'm moving in with my little plushies... you'll need to grab a Building Kit from our fluffy friend <style=NpcName>Mobai</style>.
No rush, just take it easy. Stroll around with a relaxed mood, and you'll surely find a lovely spot along the way. As for my prep?... {A歪头}Hmm, want some cookies?
Baa-mm, this time it's a little... If I'm coming over, I'll need to wash my hair thoroughly, {A梳头}and make sure all the curls are properly floofalicious first, baa!
